member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET
member.summary: Contains the reference frames needed to perform video processing.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET.NumPastFrames
member.summary: The number of past reference frames provided in ppPastFrames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET.ppPastFrames
member.summary: A pointer to an array of surfaces. The number of elements in the array is NumPastFrames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET.pPastSubresources
member.summary: An array of subresource indices for the list of ppPastFrames textures. NULL indicates subresource 0 for each resource.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET.NumFutureFrames
member.summary: The number of future reference frames provided in ppPastFrames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET.ppFutureFrames
member.summary: A pointer to an array of surfaces. The number of elements in the array is NumFutureFrames.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_PROCESS_REFERENCE_SET.pFutureSubresources
member.summary: An array of subresource indices for the list of ppFutureFrames textures. NULL indicates subresource 0 for each resource.
